text: Rastamouse is a British animated program on CBeebies. The show has been airing since January 31, 2011. In 2021, for the show's 10th anniversary, the official Facebook account revealed that a movie is in development and will be made in collaboration with DreamWorks and Disney In May 2025, Riley Mitchell announced 4 Rastamouse video games. In that same month, he announced that a reboot will come to Disney+ in October 2026. == References == Category:2011 British television series debuts Category:2015 British television series endings Category:British animated television series Category:British children's television series Category:Children's animated television series
title: Rastamouse
